name: Speak Languages!
tag_list: language-learning, languages, education, e-learning, english, estonia
overview:
Speak Languages! is a network of websites aimed at language learners. The sites offer free, high quality resources plus the opportunity to meet other language learners.

The site which has been developed the most to date is Speak English! (www.speakenglish.co.uk). This contains a phrase guide with over 3,500 phrases sorted into practical categories, plus vocabulary lists and forums. Sound is available for all the English words and phrases, recorded by native English speakers. The site is available in 34 different languages.

Sites have also been developed for French, Spanish, Italian, German, and Russian. Each site contains a phrase guide and vocabulary lists with sound, although these are more limited in scope than the site for English.

The sites currently attract around 650,000 unique visitors per month.
